register.name: DTLBIALL
register.gui_name: Data TLB Invalidate All
register.description: Invalidate all data TLB entries for the PL1&0 translation regime, subject to the Security state and Privilege level at which the instruction is executed.

register.name: DTLBIASID
register.gui_name: Data TLB Invalidate by ASID match
register.description: Invalidate data TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime that match the given ASID, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries for non-global pages that match the ASID values will be affected by this operation.

register.name: DTLBIMVA
register.gui_name: Data TLB Invalidate by VA
register.description: Invalidate data TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime that match the given VA and ASID, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: ITLBIALL
register.gui_name: Instruction TLB Invalidate All
register.description: Invalidate all instruction TLB entries for the PL1&0 translation regime, subject to the Privilege level and Security state at which the instruction is executed.

register.name: ITLBIASID
register.gui_name: Instruction TLB Invalidate by ASID match
register.description: Invalidate instruction TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime that match the given ASID, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries for non-global pages that match the ASID values will be affected by this operation.

register.name: ITLBIMVA
register.gui_name: Instruction TLB Invalidate by VA
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime stage 1 that match the given VA and ASID, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIALL
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate All
register.description: Invalidate all TLB entries for the PL1&0 translation regime, subject to the Privilege level and Security state at which the instruction is executed.

register.name: TLBIALLH
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate All, Hyp mode
register.description: Invalidate all TLB entries for the PL2 translation regime.

register.name: TLBIALLHIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate All, Hyp mode, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate all TLB entries for the PL2 translation regime, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain.

register.name: TLBIALLIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate All, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate all TLB entries for the PL1&0 translation regime, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain, subject to the Privilege level and Security state at which the instruction is executed.

register.name: TLBIALLNSNH
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate All, Non-Secure Non-Hyp
register.description: Invalidate all TLB entries for the Non-secure PL1&0 translation regime.

register.name: TLBIALLNSNHIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate All, Non-Secure Non-Hyp, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate all TLB entries for the Non-secure PL1&0 translation regime, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain.

register.name: TLBIASID
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by ASID match
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime that match the given ASID, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries for non-global pages that match the ASID values will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIASIDIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by ASID match, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime that match the given ASID, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries for non-global pages that match the ASID values will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIIPAS2
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by Intermediate Physical Address, Stage 2
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 2 of the Non-secure PL1&0 translation regime that match the given IPA and the current VMID.

bitField.name: IPA_39_12
bitField.description: Bits[39:12] of the intermediate physical address to match.

register.name: TLBIIPAS2IS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by Intermediate Physical Address, Stage 2, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 2 of the Non-secure PL1&0 translation regime that match the given IPA and the current VMID, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain.

bitField.name: IPA_39_12
bitField.description: Bits[39:12] of the intermediate physical address to match.

register.name: TLBIIPAS2L
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by Intermediate Physical Address, Stage 2, Last level
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 2 of the Non-secure PL1&0 translation regime, for the last level of translation, that match the given IPA and the current VMID.

bitField.name: IPA_39_12
bitField.description: Bits[39:12] of the intermediate physical address to match.

register.name: TLBIIPAS2LIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by Intermediate Physical Address, Stage 2, Last level, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 2 of the Non-secure PL1&0 translation regime, for the last level of translation, that match the given IPA and the current VMID, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain.

bitField.name: IPA_39_12
bitField.description: Bits[39:12] of the intermediate physical address to match.

register.name: TLBIMVA
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA
register.description: Invalidate PL1&0 regime stage 1 and 2 TLB entries for the given VA and ASID, the current VMID, and the current Security state.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIMVAA
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, All ASID
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime, for any ASID, that match the given VA, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any unlocked TLB entries that match the VA will be affected by this operation, regardless of the ASID.

register.name: TLBIMVAAIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, All ASID, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime, for any ASID, that match the given VA, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any unlocked TLB entries that match the VA will be affected by this operation, regardless of the ASID.

register.name: TLBIMVAAL
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, All ASID, Last level
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime, for the last level of translation, for any ASID, that match the given VA, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any unlocked TLB entries that match the VA will be affected by this operation, regardless of the ASID.

register.name: TLBIMVAALIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, All ASID, Last level, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime, for the last level of translation, for any ASID, that match the given VA, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any unlocked TLB entries that match the VA will be affected by this operation, regardless of the ASID.

register.name: TLBIMVAH
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, Hyp mode
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for the Non-secure PL2 translation regime that match the given VA.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIMVAHIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, Hyp mode, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for the Non-secure PL2 translation regime that match the given VA, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIMVAIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime that match the given VA and ASID, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIMVAL
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, Last level
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for the stage 1 PL1&0 translation regime, for the last level of translation, that match the given VA and ASID, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIMVALH
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, Last level, Hyp mode
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for the Non-secure PL2 translation regime, for the last level of translation, that match the given VA.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIMVALHIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, Last level, Hyp mode, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for the Non-secure PL2 translation regime, for the last level of translation, that match the given VA, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

register.name: TLBIMVALIS
register.gui_name: TLB Invalidate by VA, Last level, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate TLB entries for stage 1 of the PL1&0 translation regime, for the last level of translation, that match the given VA and ASID, on all PEs in the same Inner Shareable domain, subject to the Security state at which the instruction is executed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual address to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID value to match. Any TLB entries that match the ASID value and VA value will be affected by this operation.
